EmailTemplate.description: The thank you email that confirms their registration. Garrett Zaino, 3/22/2012
EmailTemplate.name: DC - Networking - April 26 2012.Registered Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Registering
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Spring 2012 Networking Reception: Mon Ami Gabi Reston April 26, 2012 Thanks for registering for the Washington DC Metropolitan Area Spring Networking Event hosted by MBO Partners! You are receiving this message to confirm your registration.
To find out more information about the venue, please visit Mon Ami Gabi's webite or visit the event website <http://www.monamigabi.com/home/?loc=reston> <http://info.mbopartners.com/spring-2012-registrationconfirmation>.
Sincerely,
MBO Partners Suggested dress code is business to business casual. Don't forget to bring your business cards! Questions? Please contact Marcelle Saab, Associate Relations Manager, 703-793-6006 MBO Partners 13454 Sunrise Valley Drive Suite 300 Herndon, VA 20171
Contact Us <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
